attributes.action: Change the Law to stop Dogs been allowed to do thier buiness on any sporting or public playing areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a coach of Junior Rugby there is one thing that really gets my back up and that is the Selfish Dog owners that allow their dogs to do thier bsiness on areas that Children and Adults play on. The fines just do not work.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
